Mr* Seymour Siegel, Director,
Municipal Broadcasting System,
Municipal Building,
New York 7, N. Y.
Dear Syi
May 19, 1950*
Enclosed is a letter from Joe Maddy of
the National Music Casqp which possibly has reached
your attention* hen it came to our Program Director,
Chris Donalds chi, I suggested he reply to Joe but it
would be best for him to write you about this with a
view for possible clearance rather than establishing
a series of exchanges other than our own to be used
by our own members. It may well be that you*re too
burdened with the network already to consider adding
an extra complication such as this, but in any event
I wanted you to be advised of it.
Best wishes.
Sincerely,
RBH/var
Richard B. Hull
President
Enc,
